reviews.title: Amazing, powerful wireless charger, worth the $
reviews.review_text: This is a great wireless phone charger. Especially for the price. I have a very thick case on my phone, and my son has a very thick case as well. This wireless charger has been the only one I've found that is actually strong enough to charge my phone without taking it out of it's protective case. the charge rate is extremely fast too, charging my phone as fast as a corded charger does.
Have apple phone that has the new charger. eaiser to use.this than trying to make sure i have the right apple charger.

reviews.title: Great Wireless Charger For A Great Price
reviews.review_text: I love the discreteness of it the color is really great and it charges my phone super fast I have a Samsung S21 And it works great with that charger. I look forward to buying my future products from Anker
Works great with old iphones. I was worried that it wouldn't work with the case on because I know some don't. Being an older phone, it doesn't have a magnetic case. Works perfectly.

reviews.title: Its just ok
reviews.review_text: It works in a pinch if you have nothing else. it has to sit in a very specific spot to work. used on nightstand and woken up worh phone dead because bumped during the night. If is an emergency buy otherwise get something bett.

Price for obvious reasons - there is no reason in-store price should be higher than buying it online. This type of stuff makes me want to shop elsewhere Satisfaction/quality: I have not used it much yet, but you're forcing me to rate it anyway in order to complete the survey. I should have the option to skip these questions

Make sure your phone is capable of wirelessly charging before you get this charger had to learn the hard way from people telling me that my phone was capable of charging wirelessly and come to find out my phone was able to wirelessly charge but the charger didn't work although the return process was very quick and easy.

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: This Doesn't really work at all. I thought it looked nice and it worked for a little bit but now there is basically no magnet to charge. I even take my cover off and no good. My phone charges fine with my other wireless chargers but this one is disappointing
Not very good at all. Hard to get it to charge anything and when it does takes a long time. Wouldn't recommend.

reviews.title: Buyer Beware
reviews.review_text: The device was a defective piece of junk! I should've known a electronic device that affordable would be sketchy. People, please be careful who you purchase items from online. Some sellers are complete fraudster.

reviews.title: Simply didn't work
reviews.review_text: Does not charge my phone. (iPhone 14)

reviews.title: Stopped working Quickly
reviews.review_text: Stopped working after only a few days.

reviews.title: Easy to use from a good brand
reviews.review_text: You can trust pretty much anything Anker sells and this charging pad is no different. The surface is a grippy texture which adds some extra grip. Comes with a black charging cable and brick

reviews.title: not a fan of phone charger
reviews.review_text: My phone took quite a while to charge. It seems like you have to get it in just the right position for it to work. its just too.slow for me. I am odering a different charger.

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Grandson was having issues with the charging port on his iPhone. He said his phone could be charged on the charging pad so we took a look to see if he could get an inexpensive one quick and found this one. Works great!

There's nothing to keep the phone from sliding off the charger. It's not very fast at charging. When I'm using my data by otherwise not touching my phone sometimes my phone dies even though it's charging at 50%. Sometimes when I wake up in the morning it's still not charged even though it wasn't being used for anything, not even data was being used, and that was with it on the charger and the charging light being in fir several hours.
no wonder it was on clearance it is a horribly slow charger wouldn't get the phone fully charged even left on there all night
It doesn't work. i downloaded the customer service and said the product no longer in use with the company

It's a little finicky to get your device on the exact spot, and if it gets bumped it may stop charging. Other than that, Anker proves that it's a great brand. This worked right out of the box, exactly as I wanted and needed.

reviews.title: why was I sent a refund for this item?
reviews.review_text: I just got a notification saying that a refund was completed, and when I tapped on it , it took me to a review for this item. I did not request a return or refund for this item. However, I have been sent a full refund to my bank account. I've been using this item since the moment I got it, and it has worked perfectly fine. My family has been happily using anchor products for years with little to any issues whatsoever. The white thing I have wrapped around the cord is a cord protector because I have cats that like to destroy things.

reviews.title: Not com
reviews.review_text: I was able to use the device twice before it stopped working. By the third day, when I set my Moto G stylus on the charger, it worked for two seconds and immediately stopped charging. I should have gone with my first instinct and bought a charger from the Motorola site.

reviews.title: Doesn't work
reviews.review_text: Cheap piece of crap don't fully charge my phone and puts my phone on a slow charge every time wouldn't reccomend buying this
it says it was compatible with android,...not true. I need you all to send me one that really works...
Great wireless charger that does not get warm, but preform all duties expected- very wise purchase!!

reviews.title: Awesome Charger
reviews.review_text: I've used it for months now and have had no problems with it. Fully charges your device in a short period of time and is really convenient!

reviews.title: Sick and tired of being ripped off!
reviews.review_text: Walmart charged me instantly for an item that was supposed to be in store and in stock IT WAS NEITHER, but my money was not refunded instantly or even at all. So far this has been the routine; charge me for something I don't receive, no refund, call cust, service in far off lands and speak w/ inarticulate folks w/ no grasp for the language and keep your fingers crossed. I don't believe they want to refund my money and count on me giving up. AT even $20 a pop times thousands of 20's add up to one heck of a profit per day. Even if they do return your money in 10 days, how much profit did they make in interest off of your money.
Definitely does not charge through case and weak charge as it is

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: It is not working. Will start charging them a little late when you grab phone it didn't charge.
Do not waste your money! It works only at times and still does not charge well. I'm very dissatisfied and out my money

reviews.title: Not Great
reviews.review_text: The charger worked, but i had to take off my phone case most of the time. It was not very fast and after a week it stopped working altogether. It worked again a bit later but its very inconsistent and my phone gets really hot when it charges.

reviews.title: Great Charger!!!
reviews.review_text: I tried 2 different and more expensive wireless chargers from Amazon and neither would charge through my otterbox case and this one started charging immediately with no issues at all. Charges very fast too.
I will be returning this item. It doesn't charge well at all
The product seems good so far. Not able to tell if it is powered or not until I charge my phone
Even though I haven't set it up I'm sure everything will be equal to my expectations.

reviews.title: Not Bad
reviews.review_text: Works as intended. Light and easy to store.

reviews.title: Samsung S23
reviews.review_text: This does work for Samsung S23. Just a fast charger and not a super fast charger. which is fine, as long as it works.

reviews.title: Easy to Use
reviews.review_text: This was as described and easy to use. No need to constantly plug in to charge.
it doubles the time to charge my phone from 2 hrs to 4

reviews.title: Slow charging
reviews.review_text: It works perfectly fine but it charges slow. The product says fast charging but it's not.

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: Didn't even charge well stayed at the same battery for 30 minutes
We are on vacation and forgot to bring a phone charger. We ordered this charger and it forked perfectly for our needs
It works pretty good doesnt charge so fast but good for charging over night when u go to bed .

reviews.title: No Go
reviews.review_text: Charger pad gets really hot while charging. Charging is very very slow.
It was available at a reasonable price and met my expectations
Love the wireless charger pad. This is the first time I have ordered this item. I love it!!!!!

reviews.review_text: Phones fall off and charger connects then disconnects. Disappointed. Returning.

reviews.review_text: This worked as expected. It was easy to set up. So far, we've had no issues.
Perfect, thank you very much, I feel satisfied, I recommend it to you.
works perfect. styled look. wish vid would have been little longer but had extra 10ft to replace already so it worked out.

reviews.title: disappointed
reviews.review_text: doesn't work with iphone 13 or iphone xr

reviews.title: Works very well!
reviews.review_text: My son's charging port went out on his phone. I was looking for a way to charge his phone quickly. This works.

reviews.title: decent charger
reviews.review_text: decent charger, I have a flip phone and sometimes it does not pick up connection with charging plate whether open or closed. charges relatively quickly. charging cord average length for about a foot and a half. plate is slim design. overall device works well and this compact.
Works great, even through an OtterBox. Gets pretty warm though. Not sure if that's normal or not.
My phone was having a hard time connecting to cord charger. This has been a perfect solution
The pad did not charge my phone nor did it charge my tablet
Love this item it makes it so easy to charge your phone

reviews.title: Doesn't work :(((
reviews.review_text: Charges my phone for about 30 seconds then stops…

reviews.title: Charger pad
reviews.review_text: Works great even through the Otter box.

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.review_text: Consistently loses charge. You have to put it on just right and even then it only charges for a second before your phone indicates it is not being charged. Will not work with any cases including wireless charging supporting cases.

reviews.title: Worked great
reviews.review_text: I bought this charger when I lost my Apple charge. This charger worked great and I found it easier to use than to deal with the charging cord for my iPhone.

reviews.title: Nice Charger
reviews.review_text: Looks great with a and has a low profile. It charges fast but becomes a little warm, and my phone does as well. This could be completely normal though.

reviews.title: Works great so far
reviews.review_text: Needed a wireless charging option because my charging port is messed up and won't charge with a regular charger. I like that the surface of this one isn't as slippery as some others so my phone stays in place and charges.

reviews.title: CHARGE !!!
reviews.review_text: I had to get a wireless charger due to my iPhone having a charging port issue. It was suggested that I get at least a 10 watt by the phone repairman. I felt like this was a good buy and it is very easy to use. Per the repairman it is also the preferred way to charge an iPhone. Who knew ??? My phone has since been repaired, but I am still using the charger and am very happy with it.

reviews.title: instructions were a bit confusing
reviews.review_text: it worked once i figured out how to do it. works great now.
Store was unable to locate item and I had to wait another day for it to be delivered from the store I was at despite being in stock.

reviews.title: Great charger!
reviews.review_text: Having an issue with the charging port on an Android phone and this was the perfect solution. Charges quickly

reviews.title: Didnt work as promised.

reviews.title: Always so nice to talk to the workers.

reviews.title: Does NOT Work with iPhone 15Pro
reviews.review_text: I purchased this charger with high hopes, but unfortunately, it doesn't work with my iPhone 15Pro. Despite the product description suggesting compatibility, I couldn't get it to function properly. Disappointed with the lack of functionality and compatibility.

reviews.title: garbage
reviews.review_text: it didn't tell me it didn't work for my phone

reviews.title: Not for the 15 pro
reviews.review_text: Bought this yesterday cause once again my charger port on my iPhone is messed up. Price was good but I got it home to charger my phone and it lasts every bit of 5-10 seconds and stops charging. I will be returning it and looking for something else.

reviews.title: Slim and compact
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the design of this charger. The charging pad is super slim, compact, and lightweight. The charging pad looks identical to a coaster. This design makes it discreet and super easy to travel with. The charger is efficient and quickly charges my phone. I would definitely recommend this charger.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This wireless charger pad worked great for an iPhone. It is very user friendly and can travel easily of course. Charging speed is pretty good, not super fast but it doesn't take too long to charge the phone. A call out would be that, my phone case sometimes interferes with the charging and needs to be removed.

reviews.title: Great, versatile wireless charger!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Anker 318 Wireless Charger Pad has been a great charger for my phone. This sleek, slim pad plugs into the wall and charges my phone wirelessly. I have had other wireless chargers that require perfect placement on the pad; this product does not require that. As long as my phone is on the pad, it gets charged. The cord is able to removed from the pad which makes it great to pack up and travel with! I like the black color since it is touched constantly. I also like that it can be used for iPhones or androids, so friends can throw their phone on to charge as well if needed. I highly recommend the Anker 318 Wireless Charger if you are in need of a new phone charger.

reviews.title: Awesome charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This wireless charger is absolutely amazing. It is very light weight and compact. It has a slim profile which allows it to blend into the desk easily. It charged my phone very fast and reliably. I will be getting another for my work.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this Anker 318 wireless charger pad in the mail to review the other day I got it and looked the install on the back of the box an plugged it in an I put my cell phone in it but couldn't get it o charge I think it was my fault not doing something write it maybe it my cell phone not hooked right I don't know but Im gonna mess with it more an see

reviews.title: easy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like that this can charge my phone without using an actual plug in charger because those seem to break more and I can go through tons of them because they can be made cheaply. This is easy to use plus in and put the back of your phone on it and thats it!

reviews.title: Solid charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this a while back and am impressed with the design. Super low profile and the surface is nice. Great that it came with the ac adapter too, and not just the usb charging cable. Bonus they are both good quality accessories. Completely satisfied for the moment lol

reviews.title: Works good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It didn't work for my android so I used it for my boyfriend's iPhone and it worked very well. Changed in less that a couple hours and so far so good I could look into one that works with my phone later down the road. You definitely have to have a phone that accepts wireless charging to use this

reviews.title: Great charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great charger. Easy to install and use. Great compact to take when traveling to use at hotel. No need to have a cord and it charged with my case on which is not bulky. Very recommended as a great source of charge.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger works wonderfully with my phone. My family members all tested it out with their devices. We have Android phones and Apple devices. When used with each one, we were happy with the results of how fast it charged each device. We charged from the wall and connected to devices. Also happy with results. I would purchase additional chargers as gifts for friends and family.

reviews.title: good charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a good charger for mainly peripherals. Headphones, small gadgets, and things like that. It'll charge phones as well, but it's not a fast charger so it'll do so slowly. That might not be an issue for you if you just use it over night, the slow charging might even be better for battery health.

reviews.title: Great charger!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got the Anker 318 Wireless Charger pad. I've wanted a charging pad for a while and this one looked small and sleek. The only issue I had was I have to take off my phone cover for it to completely charge my phone. Which is fine since I use it while I'm working from home and have it right next to my work computer. If I leave my phone cover on then it charges for a little then stops. And repeat. Overall, I'm happy with it!

reviews.title: Great for on the go
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger is amazing it's so light weight and so easy to just put in your bag and take with you. I was worried that it wouldn't charge fast but it does. I would definitely recommend this charger to others as well.

reviews.title: It works
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This pad looks nice and charges my phone. It is pretty simple and does all it needs to do. The only thing I don't like is the bright light that comes on when it's charging. Does not work well if you're charging while sleeping unless you cover the bright light.
excellent! high-speed wireless charging at an excellent price.

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: I brought this because I was in need of a charger fast. I am so glad I did because it works great, and charges as stated. Great charger at a reasonable price. works just as good as the name brand.

reviews.title: Interference issues
reviews.review_text: Doesn't work with the phone cases that have the magnetic ring

reviews.review_text: Phone wouldn't charge due to water in port. Pad made the phone charge quickly
